about.intro:
Richtig Pferd is a password generator. It generates passwords that are easy to remember but hard to guess. All passwords are generated exclusively in your browser. No data is transmitted to a server.
This project is inspired by the {0}.
about.words: To generate secure passwords, random words are selected from a {0} containing over 25,000 German words. These include nouns, verbs, and adjectives. The words are randomly chosen and concatenated.
about.api: The API can also be used to generate passwords. This API is open source and can be found on {0}. The documentation is available on {1}.
about.contributors: Additional contributors can be found on {0}.
about.gift: This project is a gift for my longtime mentor and friend
about.contribute: If you want to contribute to this project or help translate it, you can do so on {0}.
